thread.title: Great hotel option in Chelsea
thread.title_full: Great hotel option in Chelsea - Review of The GEM Hotel Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dena R
title: Great hotel option in Chelsea
text:
Booking a hotel is always terrifying after reading the reivews on yelp. This hotel was great. Staff is chill and helpful and the hotel is what you need: clean bathroom and a bed. Close to 7th and 8th Ave metros and right next door to a (slightly overpriced) but delicious healthy food grab n go food market/coffee shop/restaurant. I never felt unsafe staying here and the hotel is small enough that staff is attentive to any needs that might arise. Don't hesitate and book here if you are wanting to stay in Chelsea.
Room Tip: They have bathrobes! See more room tips
